## RumInitConfiguration.traceSampleRate property

The percentage of requests to trace: 100 for all, 0 for none. See \[Connect RUM and Traces\](https://docs.datadoghq.com/real\_user\_monitoring/platform/connect\_rum\_and\_traces/?tab=browserrum) for further information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
traceSampleRate?: number | undefined;
```
